name: Mr Buoyancy's Aquarium
description:
Help. Mr Buoyancy's aquarium has been overrun by those despicable eyes. Help him sort them into their own tanks!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pretty much all mouse controlled to drag them into their tanks. Some power-ups such as the bomb can blast them away quickly or use the paint can to either change the colour of the eyes or the tanks themselves. Use carefully.

You can also trigger a little jump scare by pushing any keys on the keyboard if you like.

Good luck

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is actually a remake of an old game I made in 2014 for Project Revival Jam 2: https://gamejolt.com/games/mr_buoyancys_aquarium/5307
